titleStmt.title: The answer of the Commissioners of the Navie, to a scandalous pamphlet, published by Mr Andrewes Burrell.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Commissioners of the Admiralty and the Navy.

notesStmt.note: A reply to. Burrell, Andrewes. To the Right Honourable, the High Court of Parliament, the humble remonstrance of Andrewes Burrell Gent. (Wing B5973).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
